topicTitle: Ladies and Gents, it is good to be back.

posts.postText:
After an admittedly tough transition period, me and kryzoid will be back in action.
I have successfully settled in at Florida Institute of Technology and kryzoid now
has unlimited internet access from an undisclosed location powered by twenty hamsters on hamster wheels.

Erm, I will be more active unless otherwise specified or have lots of homework.. and umm, it's hot and humid in florida
and getting raped by mosquitoes sucks.
Welcome back! And try to have fun in Florida!
I'm at school there too! What building?
